definition: Xiaomi, Chinese electronics company founded in 2010
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]

sentences.english: Yes, Remi's dream-seeking adventure takes only two months.
sentences.chinese: 的确，小米的全部寻梦之旅一共也只有两个月。

sentences.english: Exposed thousands of children Eyebright Eye Gel, the effect is good and price is not expensive.
sentences.chinese: 露千儿小米草眼胶，效果好而且价钱不贵。

sentences.english: To any dream-seeker, Remi is a lucky dog.
sentences.chinese: 对于任何一个寻梦者而言，小米实在是太幸运了。

sentences.english: No, for there was millet plus pickles.
sentences.chinese: 没有饿死，还有小米加酸菜。

sentences.english: Moreover, Xiaomi's services aren't offered anywhere outside China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，小米的服务提供范围仅限于中国。

sentences.english: Together with three other families, they are using a donkey cart to transport their big bags of millet home.
sentences.chinese: 他同三个家庭一起用驴车把大袋的小米往家里运。

sentences.english: Product Description: Dry food formula made with Lamb, Millet, Amaranth, Barley and Brown Rice.
sentences.chinese: 配方使用羊，小米，苋，大麦和啡米而制成。

sentences.english: Pork irrigation soup packets , Carrots eggs bag, millet congee.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉灌汤包，胡萝卜鸡蛋包，小米粥。

sentences.english: Remi is a rat living in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 小米是一只生活在巴黎的老鼠。

sentences.english: A lean patent portfolio has hindered Xiaomi's efforts to ramp up exports.
sentences.chinese: 专利组合薄弱迄今阻碍着小米扩大出口的努力。

sentences.english: Liu xie, many want to eat lotus root starch, xie millet lotus root starch is reaction.
sentences.chinese: 刘谢多多要吃藕粉，谢小米一看藕粉就有反应。

sentences.english: Clinical observation found that eating millet helps to the prevention of aging.
sentences.chinese: 临床观察发现，吃小米有防止衰老的作用。

sentences.english: Speculations over Xiaomi manufacturing phones in India are once again heating up.
sentences.chinese: 小米手机印度产的猜测再次升温。

sentences.english: Taro cream pork , fried rape, rice, millet congee.
sentences.chinese: 香芋扣肉，炝油菜心，米饭，小米粥。

sentences.english: Can say, the price of direct let millet fight to win or die.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，这个价格直接就让小米背水一战了。

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
rice flour/rice-flour noodles/(Internet slang) Xiaomi fan
GOME, electronics chain founded in Beijing in 1987
Google, Internet company and search engine
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
